steps.description: Slice-Slice two 1/2 inch thick rounds from a baguette (slice slanted)
add-1/16 cup basil to a bowl
Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate
steps.modified_description: Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes and dont wait until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate

errors.description: toast but do not until charred and crispy

steps.description: add-1/4 tsp salt to a bowl
Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into halves
steps.modified_description: Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into 4 parts instead of halves

errors.description: cut cherry tomatoes in to 4 parts instead of halves

steps.description: add-1/4 tsp pepper to a bowl
add-1/8 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl
steps.modified_description: add-1/8 cup mozzarella to a bowl and cheese is not fully shredded

errors.description: mozzarella added is not fully shredded

steps.description: Combine-Combine the contents of the bowl
Spoon-Spoon the mixture from the bowl onto the bread

errors.description: Brush-Brush 2 slices of baguette with olive oil on both sides
add-In a bowl, add the cut cherry tomatoes
